attributes.description: Managed dashboard for reviewing Alerts gathered via the Sysdig Integration

params.markdown:
This dashboard provides information about the Security Alerts collected by the Sysdig integration.

Alerts are broken down by category, source, and type of event. Further investigation into the details of the individual Alerts can be done via Alert Stream display.

[**Integration Page**](/app/integrations/detail/sysdig/overview)

attributes.title: [Logs Sysdig] Alerts Overview
